text: Mein tum say nahi kehta kay meray pass Allah kay khazaney hain (suno!) mein ghaib ka ilm bhi nahi rakhta na mein yeh kehta hun kay mein koi farishta hun na mera yeh qol hai kay jin per tumhari nigahen zillat say parr rahi hain unhen Allah Taalaa koi nemat dey ga hi nahi inn kay dil mein jo hai ussay Allah hi khoob janta hai agar mein aisi baat kahon to yaqeenan mera shumar zalimon mein ho jaye ga
